description: This course was built with one simple goal in mind: to teach you how to find anyone’s business email address in 5 minutes or less. At the end of this short workshop, you will be armed with a repeatable framework to quickly discover anyone’s business email address. This is a highly tactical workshop. We’ll cover topics such as email formatting and email validation techniques. I’ll also teach you how to use some awesome, free email hunting tools that I use on a regular basis. This course is designed for entrepreneurs, sales/marketing professionals, PR teams, and anyone who uses email to communicate at work. Please note that we will not cover how to find personal email addresses (ex: [at] gmail [dot] com)
title: How to Find Anyone's Email Address
